text: Mutation de genetic variation foforo bɛka ho, na sɛlɛkhyin yi no fi pool of expressed variation no mu.

English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Twi: Ako no mfiase no na na ɛtaa tɛ nsu no ani, na bere a bere radar fii ase bae no ɛbɔɔ adwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ na eyi hyɛɛ submarine s no maa ɛkɔɔ nsu no ase tonn na obiara ahunu no.

Twi: Mutation de genetic variation foforo bɛka ho, na sɛlɛkhyin yi no fi pool of expressed variation no mu.

Twi: Ɛpo atwitwa Turkey afa abiɛsa ho ahyia: Aegean po no kɔ atɔe, Ɛpo Tuntum no kɔ atifi ɛna Mediterranean Po no kɔ anaafo. 
English: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

Twi: Ako no mfiase no na na ɛtaa tɛ nsu no ani, na bere a bere radar fii ase bae no ɛbɔɔ adwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ na eyi hyɛɛ submarine s no maa ɛkɔɔ nsu no ase tonn na obiara ahunu no. 
English: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.

Twi: Kwan a wɔfaa so yɛɛ adwuma, ɛbɔɔ asraafo ne temanmufo nneɛma pii guiɛ, ɛwom sɛ akwansi yi buu wiase nyinaa mmmara a na wɔayɛ bɛboro mfeha abien a na atwam so de. 
English: The submarines were also used to attack convoys, which were a major threat to the war.
clean_output: The submarines were also used to attack convoys, which were a major threat to the war.
